description: Portfolio represents a collection of stocks and its shares.

StockHoldings.description: Describes the array of stock holdings.

StockSymbol.description: Denotes the symbol of the stock.

NameOfStock.description: Denotes the name of the stock.

StockLastKnownValueTimestamp.description: Denotes the time of the last known value of the stock.

NumberOfStocksPurchased.description: Denotes the number of stocks purchased.

PriceOfShareAtPurchase.description: Denotes the price of a share at the tine of purchase.

PurchaseID.description: Denotes the identification number of the purchase.
